description:
Five thousand years ago, traditional Chinese medicine shared the profound wisdom and connection between the physical body and the emotional body. If you have lung issues, you could experience grief and sadness. If you have grief and sadness, it could affect your lungs. They are interrelated. In this course you will learn how to transform grief and sadness and blockages in the lungs.

This interactive 45-minute course is presented in six segments where you will learn sacred, simple, practical and highly-effective techniques to self heal grief and sadness. You will also receive extraordinary soul healing blessings from Dr. and Master Sha for healing grief and sadness.

This course is appropriate for anyone who suffers from occasional to frequent grief and sadness, and for anyone who wishes to prevent grief, sadness and lung issues, and is appropriate for all age groups. Instructions are given verbally and visually to support your learning.
title: How To Self Heal Grief and Sadness
